thread.title: Comment on Terry Rozier: “I’m not a Cardinal no more” by Not So Fast
thread.title_full: Comment on Terry Rozier: “I’m not a Cardinal no more” by Not So Fast

author: Not So Fast
title: Comment on Terry Rozier: “I’m not a Cardinal no more” by Not So Fast
text:
October 21, 2015 at 9:25   
L1C – until the prostitutes start talking bob October 21, 2015 at 9:33   
I don’t know what the gist of that statement is? I don’t want to talk about it? I have no loyalty to the program from whence I came? I have no loyalty to my coach and former team mates? Or I just don’t give a f$#k.? I can’t imagine one of the past CATS saying that? Of course I don’t think they could do it with the eloquence that Rozier did. LMAO. WOW. What a vocabulary. He will be in broadcasting no doubt. BenHur October 21, 2015 at 9:51   
L1C-I’m outa this dump. Screw you Louisville. catdaddyd October 21, 2015 at 9:57   
Should’ve stayed two more years, “no more.” Mathlete October 21, 2015 at 9:59   
#Lemmego1stCallgirls4ever! October 21, 2015 at 10:23   
“I’m not a Cardinal no more.” 
Can’t blame you, friend. Being a Louisville man these days means looking up at the gutter. 
#L1C4getaboutit. seccats October 22, 2015 at 5:59 am | Permalink | Reply 
Whoever is running the English dept at UL needs to be canned along with Rick and the rest of that crew. ukjaybrat October 22, 2015 at 7:45 am | Permalink | Reply 
a true louisville man… Louisville First Cards Whatever Mixxy October 22, 2015 at 7:45 am | Permalink | Reply 
So does his clever use of the double negative actually convey support for the Cards? Legendary Coach Don Shula October 22, 2015 at 9:01 am | Permalink | Reply 
President Ramsey your English department needs it accreditation revoked just like many of the other departments on campus. Stay Classy October 22, 2015 at 9:14 am | Permalink | Reply 
Louisville is gonna burn for this..why is everyone making fun of the kids grammar? Let’s not stoop down to their level…his grammar has nothing to do with any of it..let’s go Cats! Towles' Man Bun October 22, 2015 at 9:28 am | Permalink 
Agreed. There was a time when U of L, Indiana, et al. where blasting Bledsoe, MKG, and Cousins for their inability to speak “intelligently”. Kids are a product of their upbringing, and we can’t always expect college to magically fix those deficiencies (especially when their eye is on the pros). 
Focus on his lack of loyalty; that’s all we need. Definitely no #LaFamilia in their blood… Towles' Man Bun October 22, 2015 at 9:28 am | Permalink | Reply 
*were October 22, 2015 at 9:29 am | Permalink | Reply 
L1CUL8R October 23, 2015 at 4:56 am | Permalink | Reply 
So you mean to tell me this whole L1C4 thing was shenanigans, L1C4oruntiltheshithitsthefan Post Comment - New and Improved (not really, it just works now)
